descriptionMdByRank.1: ATK is increased by **12%**. Inflicting Aero Erosion on the target gives **24%** Aero DMG Bonus for 10s. Hitting targets with Aero Erosion reduces their Aero RES by **10%** for 20s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

descriptionMdByRank.5: ATK is increased by **24%**. Inflicting Aero Erosion on the target gives **48%** Aero DMG Bonus for 10s. Hitting targets with Aero Erosion reduces their Aero RES by **16%** for 20s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.
